name: Catch Ball
description:
This is an interesting game. In the game, enemies will appear above different boxes. As long as you can click on them quickly, you can get a certain score.

Game play

1. Concentrate and use both hands and eyes. Speed is the key factor to decide the outcome.

2. Don't be distracted by the funny pictures on the box, and don't be soft hearted.

3. It is not only required to be fast, but also accurate. Sometimes because of impatience, it may lead to your mistakes.

4. Challenge your limits, stay alert and get higher scores!

Game features

The super cute and funny painting style is very pleasing!

Leisure and fun play, full of fun!

Easy to play, easy to use, just click the mouse to play.
